about.title: My Advantage
about.description1: I'm a self-taught software engineer, a self-taught Japanese speaker, and a professionally trained musician.
about.description2: I fell in love with coding while I was an English teacher in Japan. Starting with HTML, CSS, and Javascript, I worked hard to improve my skills and now make complex full-stack applications with frameworks such as React, Vue, Gatsby, and Next JS.
about.description3: I am currently working as a software engineer at Rapptr Labs.
about.description4: You can reach me at Zach.Stone.Developer@gmail.com
